Object.Field: Current ETL_PROC_WID for the current run

# To get statistics from the control table C_ODI_PARAM and C_LOAD_DATES import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Connection for Odi on Oracle
driver, url, user, passwd = ( '<?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_JAVA_DRIVER") ?>', '<?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_JAVA_URL") ?>', '<?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME") ?>', '<?=snpRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS") ?>')
# Register driver lang.Class.forName(driver) # Create a connection object myConSnp = sql.DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, passwd)
#Initialize variables
errmsg = "" isPkgRunnable = "N" pkgName = "<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NAME").toUpperCase().replaceAll("^CHILD_","").trim()?>" pkgVersion = '<?=odiRef.getSession("SCEN_VERSION")?>' pkgType = '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NAME").toUpperCase().replaceAll("^CHILD_","").trim().substring(0,3)?>' etlProcwid = "1" executionId = "1" currentIteration = "0" targetTable = 'NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP' isMultithreaded = '0'
if pkgType == 'SDE': currentBusinessDate = "#RNR_ORACLE_RETAIL_ANALYTICS.RA_SRC_BUSINESS_CURRENT_DT" schemaName = '<?=snpRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W") ?>' if isMultithreaded == "1": currentIteration = "#RA_BI.RA_SRC_THREAD_VAL"
else: currentBusinessDate = "#RNR_ORACLE_RETAIL_ANALYTICS.RA_BUSINESS_CURRENT_DT" schemaName = '<?=snpRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("D") ?>' if isMultithreaded == "1": currentIteration = "#RA_BI.RA_THREAD_VAL"
#Frame execution queries
sqlSelect1 = "SELECT COALESCE((SELECT PARAM.PARAM_VALUE FROM " + str(schemaName) + ".C_ODI_PARAM PARAM WHERE PARAM.SCENARIO_NAME = '" + str(pkgName) + "'" sqlSelect2 = "AND PARAM.SCENARIO_VERSION = DECODE('" + str(pkgVersion) + "','','001','" + str(pkgVersion) + "') AND PARAM.PARAM_NAME=" sqlSelect3 = "),( SELECT PARAM.PARAM_VALUE FROM " + str(schemaName) + ".C_ODI_PARAM PARAM WHERE PARAM.SCENARIO_NAME = 'GLOBAL' AND PARAM.PARAM_NAME=" sqlSelect4 = "),'1') PARAM_VALUE FROM DUAL" sqlSelect5 = "AND PARAM_VALUE ='" + str(targetTable) + "'"
#Execute queries to retrieve value for ETL_PROC_WID,EXECUTION_ID,TARGET_TABLE_NAME from C_ODI_PARAM
sqlSelect = str(sqlSelect1) + str(sqlSelect2) + "'ETL_PROC_WID'" + str(sqlSelect3) + "'ETL_PROC_WID'" + str(sqlSelect4) myStmtSnp = myConSnp.createStatement() rsSelect = myStmtSnp.executeQuery(sqlSelect) while (rsSelect.next()): etlProcwid = rsSelect.getString("PARAM_VALUE") rsSelect.close() myStmtSnp.close()
sqlSelect = str(sqlSelect1) + str(sqlSelect2) + "'EXECUTION_ID'" + str(sqlSelect3) + "'EXECUTION_ID'" + str(sqlSelect4) myStmtSnp = myConSnp.createStatement() rsSelect = myStmtSnp.executeQuery(sqlSelect) while (rsSelect.next()): executionId = rsSelect.getString("PARAM_VALUE") rsSelect.close() myStmtSnp.close()
#sqlSelect = str(sqlSelect1) + str(sqlSelect2) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect5) + str(sqlSelect3) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect5) + str(sqlSelect4)
#sqlSelect = str(sqlSelect1) + str(sqlSelect2) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect3) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect5) + str(sqlSelect4)
if '1' == '0': sqlSelect = str(sqlSelect1) + str(sqlSelect2) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect5) + str(sqlSelect3) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect5) + str(sqlSelect4) else: sqlSelect = str(sqlSelect1) + str(sqlSelect2) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect3) + "'TARGET_TABLE_NAME'" + str(sqlSelect5) + str(sqlSelect4)
myStmtSnp = myConSnp.createStatement() rsSelect = myStmtSnp.executeQuery(sqlSelect) while (rsSelect.next()): targetTable = rsSelect.getString("PARAM_VALUE") rsSelect.close() myStmtSnp.close()
if str(targetTable) == "1": targetTable = 'NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP' raise "\nError:Process control error","\nErrorDetails:Target tablename %s not defined in C_ODI_PARAM" % (targetTable)
#Collect value to Check whether this package is runnable.
sqlSelect1 = "SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS PKG_START FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END RESULT_COL FROM " + str(schemaName) + ".C_LOAD_DATES WHERE PACKAGE_NAME = '" + str(pkgName) + "'" sqlSelect2 = "AND TARGET_TABLE_NAME = '" + str(targetTable) + "'AND ETL_THREAD_VAL ='" + str(currentIteration) + "'AND ETL_PROC_WID = '" + str(etlProcwid) + "'AND EXEC_ID = '" + str(executionId) sqlSelect3 = "') VALIDATE_RESTART,(SELECT 'Y' RESULT_COL FROM DUAL ) VALIDATE_LOAD_OPTION WHERE VALIDATE_RESTART.RESULT_COL = VALIDATE_LOAD_OPTION.RESULT_COL AND VALIDATE_RESTART.RESULT_COL = 'Y'"
sqlSelect = str(sqlSelect1) + str(sqlSelect2) + str(sqlSelect3) myStmtSnp = myConSnp.createStatement() rsSelect = myStmtSnp.executeQuery(sqlSelect) while (rsSelect.next()): isPkgRunnable = rsSelect.getString("PKG_START") rsSelect.close() myStmtSnp.close()
myConSnp.close()
# Check whether current package can be run
if isPkgRunnable != "Y": raise "\nError:Process control error","\nErrorDetails:Package %s with thread no %s completed/running for business date %s" % (pkgName,currentIteration,currentBusinessDate)

PARAM.PARAM_VALUE FROM <?=snpRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W") ?>.C_ODI_PARAM PARAM WHERE PARAM.SCENARIO_NAME = '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NAME").toUpperCase().replaceAll("^CHILD_","").trim()?>' ('DAY','DD','D') THEN SYSDATE+(-1)*TO_NUMBER(P.PARAM_VALUE) WHEN 'DD'='WEEK' THEN SYSDATE+((-1)*TO_NUMBER(P.PARAM_VALUE)*7) WHEN 'DD' IN ('MONTH','MM') THEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,(-1)*TO_NUMBER(P.PARAM_VALUE)) WHEN 'DD'='QUARTER' THEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,(-1)*TO_NUMBER(P.PARAM_VALUE)*4) WHEN 'DD'='TRIMESTER' THEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,(-1)*TO_NUMBER(P.PARAM_VALUE)*3) WHEN 'DD'='HALF' THEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,(-1)*TO_NUMBER(P.PARAM_VALUE)*6) WHEN 'DD'='YEAR' THEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,(-1)*TO_NUMBER(P.PARAM_VALUE)*12) '<?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NAME").toUpperCase().replaceAll("^CHILD_","").trim()?>' AND PARAM.SCENARIO_VERSION = <?=snpRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W") ?>.C_ODI_PARAM PARAM WHERE PARAM.SCENARIO_NAME = 'GLOBAL' AND PARAM.PARAM_NAME='PRUNE_DAYS'),'30') PARAM_VALUE FROM DUAL) P <? } else { ?> insert into <?String vS=odiRef.getSchemaName("BIAPPS_11g_RA","D")+".";?><?String vTA="W_MCAL_DAY_D".substring(0,4);if(vTA.equals("STG_")){vTA=vS+"W_MCAL_DAY_D".substring(4);};?>/*Will be used as the Staging Table: <?=vTA?>*/ <?String vTA="W_INT_ORG_D_RTL_TMP".substring(0,4);if(vTA.equals("STG_")){vTA=vS+"W_INT_ORG_D_RTL_TMP".substring(4);};?>/*Will be used as the Staging Table: <?=vTA?>*/ <?String vTA="W_INT_ORG_DH_RTL_TMP".substring(0,4);if(vTA.equals("STG_")){vTA=vS+"W_INT_ORG_DH_RTL_TMP".substring(4);};?>/*Will be used as the Staging Table: <?=vTA?>*/ <?String vTA="W_PROD_CAT_DH_SC_RTL_TMP".substring(0,4);if(vTA.equals("STG_")){vTA=vS+"W_PROD_CAT_DH_SC_RTL_TMP".substring(4);};?>/*Will be used as the Staging Table: <?=vTA?>*/ <?String vTA="NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_FS".substring(0,4);if(vTA.equals("STG_")){vTA=vS+"NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_FS".substring(4);};?>/*Will be used as the Staging Table: <?=vTA?>*/

/* DETECTION_STRATEGY = NOT_EXISTS */ insert into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP", "BIAPPS_11g_RATEMP", "", "D") ?> T ( PROD_DP_WID, ORG_WID, ORG_SCD1_WID, ORG_LC_WID, DT_WID, SA_SQUARE_AMT, W_INSERT_DT, W_UPDATE_DT, DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, ETL_PROC_WID, INTEGRATION_ID, TENANT_ID, X_CUSTOM ,SA_LINEAR_AMT, SA_CUBIC_AMT, SA_LINEAR_MAX_AMT, SA_SQUARE_MAX_AMT, SA_CUBIC_MAX_AMT, SA_LINEAR_MIN_AMT, SA_SQUARE_MIN_AMT, SA_CUBIC_MIN_AMT, SA_FACINGS, SA_ON_DISP_IND, SA_ON_FEAT_IND, CREATED_BY_WID, CHANGED_BY_WID, CREATED_ON_DT, CHANGED_ON_DT, AUX1_CHANGED_ON_DT, AUX2_CHANGED_ON_DT, AUX3_CHANGED_ON_DT, AUX4_CHANGED_ON_DT, DELETE_FLG ) select PROD.PROD_DP_WID, ORG.ORG_WID, ORG_DH.ORG_SCD1_WID, ORG_DH.ORG_LC_WID, DAY.ROW_WID, FS.SA_SQUARE_AMT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, FS.DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, #RNR_ORACLE_RETAIL_ANALYTICS.ETL_PROC_WID, 'PROD_DP_NUM'||'~'||'ORG_NUM'||'~'||'DAY_DT', NULL, NULL ,NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, -1, -1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL from <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "W_MCAL_DAY_D", "BIAPPS_11g_RA", "", "D")?> DAY, <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "W_INT_ORG_D_RTL_TMP", "BIAPPS_11g_RATEMP", "", "D")?> ORG, <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "W_INT_ORG_DH_RTL_TMP", "BIAPPS_11g_RATEMP", "", "D")?> ORG_DH, <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "W_PROD_CAT_DH_SC_RTL_TMP", "BIAPPS_11g_RATEMP", "", "D")?> PROD, <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_FS", "BIAPPS_11g_RA", "", "D")?> FS where (1=1) And (FS.ORG_NUM=ORG.ORG_NUM AND (FS.DAY_DT BETWEEN ORG.EFFECTIVE_FROM_DT AND ORG.EFFECTIVE_TO_DT)) AND (DAY.MCAL_DAY_DT=FS.DAY_DT) AND (PROD.PROD_DP_NUM=FS.PROD_DP_NUM AND (FS.DAY_DT BETWEEN PROD.EFFECTIVE_FROM_DT AND PROD.EFFECTIVE_TO_DT)) AND (FS.ORG_NUM=ORG_DH.ORG_NUM AND (FS.DAY_DT BETWEEN ORG_DH.EFFECTIVE_FROM_DT AND ORG_DH.EFFECTIVE_TO_DT))

create index <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFNB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_F_IDX", "W") ?> on <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFNB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_F", "W") ?> (PROD_DH_WID, ORG_DH_WID, DT_WID) NOLOGGING

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
myConn = odiRef.getJDBCConnection( "DEST" )

Cmd = """ merge /*+ APPEND */ into <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_F", "BIAPPS_11g_RA", "", "D") ?> T using ( Select NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.PROD_DP_WID PROD_DH_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.ORG_WID ORG_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.ORG_SCD1_WID ORG_SCD1_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.ORG_LC_WID ORG_DH_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.DT_WID DT_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_LINEAR_AMT SA_LINEAR_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_SQUARE_AMT SA_SQUARE_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_CUBIC_AMT SA_CUBIC_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_LINEAR_MAX_AMT SA_LINEAR_MAX_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_SQUARE_MAX_AMT SA_SQUARE_MAX_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_CUBIC_MAX_AMT SA_CUBIC_MAX_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_LINEAR_MIN_AMT SA_LINEAR_MIN_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_SQUARE_MIN_AMT SA_SQUARE_MIN_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_CUBIC_MIN_AMT SA_CUBIC_MIN_AMT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_FACINGS SA_FACINGS, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_ON_DISP_IND SA_ON_DISP_IND, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.SA_ON_FEAT_IND SA_ON_FEAT_IND, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.CREATED_BY_WID CREATED_BY_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.CHANGED_BY_WID CHANGED_BY_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.CREATED_ON_DT CREATED_ON_DT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.CHANGED_ON_DT CHANGED_ON_DT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.AUX1_CHANGED_ON_DT AUX1_CHANGED_ON_DT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.AUX2_CHANGED_ON_DT AUX2_CHANGED_ON_DT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.AUX3_CHANGED_ON_DT AUX3_CHANGED_ON_DT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.AUX4_CHANGED_ON_DT AUX4_CHANGED_ON_DT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.DELETE_FLG DELETE_FLG, SYSDATE W_INSERT_DT, SYSDATE W_UPDATE_DT, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.DATASOURCE_NUM_ID DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.ETL_PROC_WID ETL_PROC_WID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.INTEGRATION_ID INTEGRATION_ID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.TENANT_ID TENANT_ID, NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP.X_CUSTOM X_CUSTOM
From <?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP", "BIAPPS_11g_RATEMP", "", "D")?> NB_SPACE_ALLOC_DP_LC_DY_TMP Where (1=1)
) S on ( T.PROD_DH_WID=S.PROD_DH_WID and T.ORG_DH_WID=S.ORG_DH_WID and T.DT_WID=S.DT_WID ) when matched then update set T.ORG_WID = S.ORG_WID, T.ORG_SCD1_WID = S.ORG_SCD1_WID, T.SA_LINEAR_AMT = S.SA_LINEAR_AMT, T.SA_SQUARE_AMT = S.SA_SQUARE_AMT, T.SA_CUBIC_AMT = S.SA_CUBIC_AMT, T.SA_LINEAR_MAX_AMT = S.SA_LINEAR_MAX_AMT, T.SA_SQUARE_MAX_AMT = S.SA_SQUARE_MAX_AMT, T.SA_CUBIC_MAX_AMT = S.SA_CUBIC_MAX_AMT, T.SA_LINEAR_MIN_AMT = S.SA_LINEAR_MIN_AMT, T.SA_SQUARE_MIN_AMT = S.SA_SQUARE_MIN_AMT, T.SA_CUBIC_MIN_AMT = S.SA_CUBIC_MIN_AMT, T.SA_FACINGS = S.SA_FACINGS, T.SA_ON_DISP_IND = S.SA_ON_DISP_IND, T.SA_ON_FEAT_IND = S.SA_ON_FEAT_IND, T.CREATED_BY_WID = S.CREATED_BY_WID, T.CHANGED_BY_WID = S.CHANGED_BY_WID, T.CREATED_ON_DT = S.CREATED_ON_DT, T.CHANGED_ON_DT = S.CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX1_CHANGED_ON_DT = S.AUX1_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX2_CHANGED_ON_DT = S.AUX2_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX3_CHANGED_ON_DT = S.AUX3_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX4_CHANGED_ON_DT = S.AUX4_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.DELETE_FLG = S.DELETE_FLG, T.W_INSERT_DT = S.W_INSERT_DT, T.W_UPDATE_DT = S.W_UPDATE_DT, T.DATASOURCE_NUM_ID = S.DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, T.ETL_PROC_WID = S.ETL_PROC_WID, T.INTEGRATION_ID = S.INTEGRATION_ID, T.TENANT_ID = S.TENANT_ID, T.X_CUSTOM = S.X_CUSTOM
when not matched then insert (
T.ROW_WID ,T.PROD_DH_WID, T.ORG_WID, T.ORG_SCD1_WID, T.ORG_DH_WID, T.DT_WID, T.SA_LINEAR_AMT, T.SA_SQUARE_AMT, T.SA_CUBIC_AMT, T.SA_LINEAR_MAX_AMT, T.SA_SQUARE_MAX_AMT, T.SA_CUBIC_MAX_AMT, T.SA_LINEAR_MIN_AMT, T.SA_SQUARE_MIN_AMT, T.SA_CUBIC_MIN_AMT, T.SA_FACINGS, T.SA_ON_DISP_IND, T.SA_ON_FEAT_IND, T.CREATED_BY_WID, T.CHANGED_BY_WID, T.CREATED_ON_DT, T.CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX1_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX2_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX3_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.AUX4_CHANGED_ON_DT, T.DELETE_FLG, T.W_INSERT_DT, T.W_UPDATE_DT, T.DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, T.ETL_PROC_WID, T.INTEGRATION_ID, T.TENANT_ID, T.X_CUSTOM
) values (
<?=snpRef.getObjectName("L", "NB_RCPO_IT_DY_SUPP_F_SEQ", "D") ?>.NEXTVAL ,S.PROD_DH_WID, S.ORG_WID, S.ORG_SCD1_WID, S.ORG_DH_WID, S.DT_WID, S.SA_LINEAR_AMT, S.SA_SQUARE_AMT, S.SA_CUBIC_AMT, S.SA_LINEAR_MAX_AMT, S.SA_SQUARE_MAX_AMT, S.SA_CUBIC_MAX_AMT, S.SA_LINEAR_MIN_AMT, S.SA_SQUARE_MIN_AMT, S.SA_CUBIC_MIN_AMT, S.SA_FACINGS, S.SA_ON_DISP_IND, S.SA_ON_FEAT_IND, S.CREATED_BY_WID, S.CHANGED_BY_WID, S.CREATED_ON_DT, S.CHANGED_ON_DT, S.AUX1_CHANGED_ON_DT, S.AUX2_CHANGED_ON_DT, S.AUX3_CHANGED_ON_DT, S.AUX4_CHANGED_ON_DT, S.DELETE_FLG, S.W_INSERT_DT, S.W_UPDATE_DT, S.DATASOURCE_NUM_ID, S.ETL_PROC_WID, S.INTEGRATION_ID, S.TENANT_ID, S.X_CUSTOM
)
""" myStmt = myConn.createStatement()
myStmt.execute('alter session enable parallel dml')
inserts = myStmt.executeUpdate(Cmd)
odiRef.setNbInsert( inserts )
myStmt.close() myStmt = None myConn.commit()
